participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, with a strong sense of responsibility towards his patients.
participant_1.background: I had to move across country for my job. I go fishing with my uncle and reminisce about the old days. I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides. I like to watch YouTube videos about welding and learn new things. I fear that I will not be able to help my patients as well as I want to.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and family-oriented, with a fondness for nature and cooking.
participant_2.background: My memories of my grandmother, who used to make the best mac and cheese in the world. I do my laundry once a week, because that is enough to keep my clothes clean and fresh. I am not a basketball player though. My favorite place is the mountains. I am married with 5 kids.

content.text: Hey! I'm about to go fishing with my uncle, what's your favorite hobby?
I like to go fishing too! I also like to watch YouTube videos about welding and learn new things.
That's cool! Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to go to the mountains and I'm married with 5 kids.
I've had to move across country for my job. I'm glad you have such a nice family to keep you company.
Yeah, I'm glad too. What's your job?
I'm a doctor and I'm afraid that I won't be able to help my patients as well as I want to.
Don't worry, you're doing a great job!
No problem! What was your favorite part of growing up?
I think my favorite part was fishing with my uncle and reminiscing about the old days.
That sounds really nice. I'm glad you had such a good childhood.
